Package advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.character

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Character
    Represents a superclass for any Characters in the game NonPlayerCharacter and Player both extend the functionality provided by the Character Class.
    CharacterManager
    The character manager class manages all the characters in the game and gives methods to allow access to characters in the game.
    NonPlayerCharacter
    AI controlled Character class, implements all functionality provided by it's superclass Character.
    Player
    The player class represents the current player(s) and stores all information about them.
